com.fortify.pub.issueparsing

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fortify.pub.issueparsing.Request
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PenTestRequest, RuntimeRequest

    public abstract class Request
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class for pentest and runtime issue requests. Pentest requests are generated by the pentesting tool. Runtime requests are observed as the application is exercised.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Request()

      Returns the http version (for instance, "https")

      • getHeader

        public java.util.List<NameValuePair> getHeader()
        Returns a list of name/value pairs representing the request headers. The keys are the header names, and the values are the header contents.
        Returns:
        a list of name/value pairs representing the request headers.

      • setHeader

        public void setHeader(java.util.List<NameValuePair> header)
        Sets the list of request headers. The keys are the header names, and the values are the header contents.
        Parameters:
        header - the new list of request headers

      • getParameter

        public java.util.List<NameValuePair> getParameter()
        Returns the URL parameters that were included with the request. The keys are the parameter names, and the values are the parameter contents.
        Returns:
        the URL parameters that were included with the request.

      • setParameter

        public void setParameter(java.util.List<NameValuePair> parameter)
        Sets the URL parameters that were included with the request. The keys are the parameter names, and the values are the parameter contents.
        Parameters:
        parameter - the URL parameters that were included with the request.
